name: MyC.Lv - Make Your Creation - High Performance Game Configuration - CS:GO, CS1.6 - Counter-Strike: Global Offensive, Counter-Strike 1.6
description: MyC.Lv - Make Your Creation - High Performance Game Configuration. This installation adds to your cs better configs and specifications. Simple, useful and effective configs for Counter Strike 1.6 and Counter Strike: Global Offensive (Tested on Non-Steam and Steam.) Install in full Counter-Strike folder as patch!
